name: Electronics Store Pack
description: Perfect for electronics stores with Specifications, Warranty, Support, and Compatibility tabs. Includes technical details, warranty information, user manuals, and system requirements.
author: Smart Product Tabs

rules.tab_content:

The compatibility tool will scan your system and provide a detailed compatibility report.

‚ö†Ô∏è Compatibility Notes

  • Driver Requirements: Latest drivers recommended for optimal performance
  • Antivirus: May require firewall/antivirus configuration
  • Virtual Machines: Limited functionality in virtualized environments
  • ARM Processors: Native support for Apple M1/M2 chips
  • Legacy Systems: Contact support for older system compatibility

installation_notes: This template is designed for electronics stores selling computers, phones, tablets, cameras, audio equipment, and other electronic devices. The tabs include technical specifications, warranty information, downloadable manuals, and system compatibility details.
styling_notes: The template includes custom CSS classes for enhanced styling. Add custom CSS to match your theme colors and typography preferences.
seo_benefits: Improves product page SEO by adding structured content about specifications, compatibility, and support information that search engines can index.
